title: SNS to SQS fanout pattern
description: This example demonstrates a fan-out pattern using SNS topic and SQS queues. Subscription filters are used to route SNS topics to the the correct SQS queue.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The three SQS queues are subscribed to the SNS Topic. The message routing logic is defined through the subscription filter policy.

The AllMetricsSqsQueue queue does not have any filter criteria and hence will receive all the messages, whereas, TemperatureSqsQueue and HumiditySqsQueue will receive messages having message attribute MetricType set to Temperature amd Humidity respectively.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
